name: William ROSS, Petitioner v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (ALLIED SIGNAL, INC. and Traveler's/Aetna), Respondents
name_abbreviation: Ross v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: William ROSS, Petitioner v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (ALLIED SIGNAL, INC. and Traveler’s/Aetna), Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of December, 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, the order of the Commonwealth Court is VACATED, and the case is REMANDED for the issuance of a decision that complies with Section 422(a), of the Workers’ Compensation Act, 77 P.S. § 834. See Daniels v. WCAB, 828 A.2d 1043 (Pa.2003).
opinions.author: ORDER PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
842 A.2d 916
William ROSS, Petitioner v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (ALLIED SIGNAL, INC. and Traveler’s/Aetna), Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 31, 2003.
